title: Mirror Amplify Gen2 website deployment and backend video outputs
description: Add root amplify.yml and amplify/backend.ts mirroring Kanbus website pattern targeting apps/korpor.us/public and custom videos CDN outputs.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Added root amplify.yml and Amplify Gen2 backend stack outputs for videos bucket/CDN URL, with site runtime consumption via amplify_outputs.json and GATSBY_VIDEOS_BASE_URL.
